TopicTitle: KSP Forums Cities: Skylines Collab. Open to all.

Articles.Content:
And save upload http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=914464523

Lovely lovely suburbia. And the population has powered ahead past 150,000, mostly from your new riverside filling up Hebaru I reckon, because my low-density tends to not hold all that many people.

So yeah Hebaru, if you want to pick a place for Monument Central and make a start on it, go ahead. Location that comes to mind is in the space south of Squares, west of Arbor, and east of Thrintunville. Although also interesting would be on an artificial island in the bay if you fancy breaking out the landscaping tool. Or maybe somewhere else altogether.

Updated save: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=915160727

I mostly just chilled and let the city run, but I did tweak some bits of my traffic, adding a one-way setup to the intersection off Brunel Island to remove most right turns which smoothed traffic flow. So decided to post the update.

Ah-ha! I have a chance to play and no one else has the save. What a coincidence! *grabs save*

Mine! Mine, I tell you! All mine! Mwahahahaha!

Edit: And done for now. Added a ghetto zone next to the spaghetti-rails behind my industrial zone to supply my expanded industrial sector with uneducated workers, which gave the population a nice little bump. Added to the water and electricity supply. Wanted to give the ghetto a commercial district nearby, but connecting it without running trucks through the ghetto would have been problematic, so I skipped it. 

Now back to trying to dominate the world with Emperor Montezuma in Civ6

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=915543086

Edited April 29, 2017 by StrandedonEarth
I have the save. Let's see if I can't wrap up Bonnemotte.

And uploaded:

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=916721286

Filled out a lot more of my area, adding the secondary CBD La Superluminique, the large suburb Battle Plains, and an ore mining district Bonnemotte Catacombs. Marked but not developed Countryside which will be some agriculture.

And I so so wanted to hit 170k, but it had to go and reach about 169,500 before falling back as the death ripple hit.

All that's left with my plans is a university campus on the north side of Bonnemotte, and that farming development.

I have the save. Time to do said. And wish Steam hadn't decided to start mucking around when it's supposed to take screenshots; fingers crossed I'll get some this time. Might have to upload them myself.

And uploaded http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=919808194

And that is my town at least complete. I've filled out the area, the traffic's behaving, I'm happy with that.

Screenies to come.

Sorry I haven't been very active on this. I've been kinda busy and I just kind of forgot about this. 

EDIT: Someone is free to anschluss my land.

Edited June 18, 2017 by ThaZeus

Awww, some missing comment and edit notification early on, weird ;...; may be not, still i don't remind the last time i played starmade, but wookayr after all

work as intended, don't live in bubble , we had a tralalala
